title: Navajo National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        Junior Ranger Program is for you!  Just fill out the book, hand it to a ranger, and receive your Junior Ranger badge (You'll take a hike, see the muesum, and watch a movie, too.).  It's your chance to learn to care.Plus: 10% off all bookstore purchases.         This Could Be You!In addition you may join us in a fun filled day with intriging fun learning about the past and the culture. See our slide attached... Navajo National Monument       Summer Fun!
